entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 6:27 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:27 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
